Instance.description: Assigns modifiers per physique type for age/gender/species

Tunable.name: BonyModifierName
Tunable.description: Modifier name associated with heavy physique. This must be prefixed with the name of the .modifiers.xml where this modifier is defined. For example: 'yfHeadModifier_Brows_Arched' or 'ymHeadBelly_Big'.

Tunable.name: FitModifierName
Tunable.description: Modifier name associated with fit physique. This must be prefixed with the name of the .modifiers.xml where this modifier is defined. For example: 'yfHeadModifier_Brows_Arched' or 'ymHeadBelly_Big'.

Tunable.name: HeavyModifierName
Tunable.description: Modifier name associated with heavy physique. This must be prefixed with the name of the .modifiers.xml where this modifier is defined. For example: 'yfHeadModifier_Brows_Arched' or 'ymHeadBelly_Big'.

Tunable.name: LeanModifierName
Tunable.description: Modifier name associated with lean physique. This must be prefixed with the name of the .modifiers.xml where this modifier is defined. For example: 'yfHeadModifier_Brows_Arched' or 'ymHeadBelly_Big'.

TunableEnum.name: OccultType
TunableEnum.description: Valid occult type for these modifiers
